ExtendedStringPointObserver (FB)
ExtendedStringPointObserver (FB)
Â¶
FUNCTION_BLOCK FINAL ExtendedStringPointObserver EXTENDS
PointObserver
IMPLEMENTS IExtendedStringPointObserver
DNP3 Master datapoint observer for a datapoint of DNP3 object group 114 âextended stringsâ.
Unlike other datapoint observer ExtendedStringPointObserver doesnt provide the received data as an output variable,
but writes to an buffer provided by the caller if the datapoint changes.

Output

flags
USINT
Flags received from Outstation. Flag values are ORâd
combinations of the following:
DNPDEFS_DBAS_FLAG_ON_LINE - the point has been read
successfully
DNPDEFS_DBAS_FLAG_RESTART - the field device that originated the
data object has been restarted. This device may be the deviced
reporting this data object.
DNPDEFS_DBAS_FLAG_COMM_LOST - the device reporting this data object
has lost communication with the originator of the data object
DNPDEFS_DBAS_FLAG_REMOTE_FORCED - the state of the binary object
has been forced to its current state at the originating device
hasTimeStamp
BOOL
Update received from Outstation has a valid time stamp.
timeStamp
LDATE_AND_TIME
Time stamp reported - valid if hasTimeStamp = TRUE, invalid
otherwise.
